name: RENTCaféResidentServices
0:
”Alexa, Open RENTCafe”
”Alexa, Start RENTCafe”
”Alexa, ask RENTCafe to pay my rent”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rent cafe
Developer Terms of Use
des:
RENTCafé Resident Services Alexa Skill is your partner in all things related to your community. We make it easier for you to pay your rent, or request maintenance using your natural voice commands.

The RENTCafé Resident Services Alexa Skill has been designed for communities that use the RENTCafé platform as their Resident Portal. This skill requires you to connect to the RENTCafé platform by using the skill's account linking option, where you would be redirected to a RENTCafé Login Page to enter your RENTCafé user name and password. (If you do not have a RENTCafé user name and password, kindly contact your leasing or property management office). 

If your leasing or property management office permits the Payments initiated through Alexa, the RENTCafé Resident Services Alexa Skill can be used to securely check your rental balance as well as initiate a payment request. Payment methods and a security pin needs to be setup in your RENTCafé account using your RENTCafé Web Portal or RENTCafé Resident Mobile App prior to initiating the payment request through the Alexa skill.

Here are some things that you can ask RENTCafé Resident Services Skill to do. 
- To get your balance, just say "ask RENTCafé to get my balance". 
- Want to place a new service request, just say "ask RENTCafé to place a new request"
- If you are ready to pay your rent, just say "ask RENTCafé to pay my rent" and we will help you securely pay your rent.
